DH module¶

Implements the required structures for a Diffie Hellman styled key exchange system.

class DH.Crypt(salt='SlTeRlOHpygTYkP3')[source]¶

Bases: object

For encryption and decryption of messages

ModularExponentiation(privatekey, publicgenerator, publicmod)[source]¶

To perform modular exponentiation using public generator as the base and publicmod as the mod element :return: Returns the final result of the modular exponentiation :rtype: int
